DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim research study evaluate effectiveness computer-based 'virtual lay advisor ' intervention relative proven human lay advisor/promotore intervention promote regular walking among inactive midlife old Latino adult . The primary analysis non-inferiority analysis compare two intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Virtual Advisors Physical Activity Promotion Underserved Communities
